body: A 16-year-old Brooklyn boy was arrested yesterday and charged with robbery in the $1,900 holdup of the driver of a soft-drink delivery truck in Cypress Hills, Queens, on Friday, the police said. title: Teen-ager Held in Robbery

body: A plainclothes police officer was shot in a thigh yesterday as he wrestled with an armed teen-ager suspected of robbing a truck driver in Brooklyn, authorities said. The suspect - William Heosto, 18 years old, of 125 Nichols Avenue, Brooklyn - was arrested and charged with attempted murder, criminal use and possession of a firearm and robbery,
